pages.text: The Soul Alloy Sword is a contribution to the warrior who possess it. It's ability launches five beams, which normally deal 20% of that sword's attack damage each. If one wishes to make the $(item)Soul Alloy Sword$() stronger, then the art of $(l:conjuring:basics/basic_gem_tinkering)Gem Tinkering$() will strengthen it so:$(br) $(li)$(#007a18)≈ Haste: Improves the speed of swinging the sword.$()
